item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: ArbitrumDAO approved the BoLD Upgrade üöÄ
Quorum was 201m ARB and the proposal received a "crazy" 210m votes which is more than ANY OTHER proposal in the DAO.
Congratulations to Arbitrum, the DAO, and everyone involved!!!
Big milestone :)
item.dc:creator: @stonecoldpat0
item.description:

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: We just announced that @OnchainHeroes & @playgigaverse will be powered by @ProofOfPlay and we have more partner applications in the pipeline.
Both will use our lightning-fast VRF which we've scaled up to 75M transactions in Pirate Nation alone.
Here's a recent talk on it.
item.dc:creator: @mattvv
item.description:
We just announced that @OnchainHeroes & @playgigaverse will be powered by @ProofOfPlay and we have more partner applications in the pipeline.

Both will use our lightning-fast VRF which we've scaled up to 75M transactions in Pirate Nation alone.

Here's a recent talk on it.

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: ZK is the endgame for rollups. @SuccinctLabs OP-Succinct helps them get there fast.
But what can ZK do for your rollup today?
We worked with @PhalaNetwork to find out. Learn how ZK lets Phala give AI agent teams like @ai16zdao cross-chain super powers with Ethereum security.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
ZK is the endgame for rollups. @SuccinctLabs OP-Succinct helps them get there fast.

But what can ZK do for your rollup today?

We worked with @PhalaNetwork to find out. Learn how ZK lets Phala give AI agent teams like @ai16zdao cross-chain super powers with Ethereum security.

item.dc:creator: @KAndrewHuang
item.description:
When I went on @BanklessHQ with @pumatheuma, we discussed why ZK is so bullish for Ethereum

@PhalaNetwork is showing what ZK + OP-Succinct can do for one rollup today

Conduit is all about helping rollups use the latest + best tech for their use case. This is the latest example

nitter.freedit.eu/conduitxyz/status/1882489673861464485#m

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: Conduit Hub is our rollup directory, with:
API keys for RPCs on Conduit chains Config files to run a node Smart contract addresses & more
It's everything you need to build on chains like @modenetwork, @GravityChain, @build_on_bob, @PhalaNetwork, @use_corn, & @ithacaxyz Odyssey
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Conduit Hub is our rollup directory, with:

API keys for RPCs on Conduit chains
Config files to run a node
Smart contract addresses & more

It's everything you need to build on chains like @modenetwork, @GravityChain, @build_on_bob, @PhalaNetwork, @use_corn, & @ithacaxyz Odyssey

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: We just published a guide to rollups-as-a-service platforms and recommend anyone considering building an L2 take a look.
Lots inside, but two points of RaaS evaluation stand out:
1) Partnership
2) Total cost of operations
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
